content_descriptors.notes: Large amounts of unrealistic blood. Two cutscenes feature cartoonish, bloody, bisected boss enemies. A large bloody skull enemy supported by veins. Some full / empty bottles implied to be alcoholic, as well as a couple depictions of characters implied to be drinking said beverages.
